channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report X-2025030528
item.description:
Report X-2025030528

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-11
  • City: CALVERTON
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On March 10th two packages were discovered during the PM sort that contained UN2880, Calcium Hypochlorite, hydrated, 5.1, II. The packages were brown boxes that had no markings or labels indicating the contents were dangerous goods. There was a suspicion of DG in the unmarked packages so they were opened and discovered a plastic pail in each, fully marked as a regulated dangerous good. The packages are being held pending investigation.

item.title: Report I-2025030016
item.description:
Report I-2025030016

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-04
  • City: New York
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 03/04/2025 shipment discovered to contain hidden DG during cargo inspection process at the DHL ZYP service center, located at 501 10th Avenue, New York, NY 10018. Transportation by road has been confirmed. Shipment also contains UN3481, Lithium batteries packed with equipment, Class 9 Single Package or Inner Packaging (if any): Packaging Type: Case J Material of Construction: Plastic Package Capacity: 60 g Amount in Package: 60 g Number in Shipment 2). Number Failed: 2

  • Description: On 03/01/2025 this shipment had hidden dangerous goods that were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the at the DHL JFK service center, Bldg 263, JFK Int'I Airport, Jamaica, NY 11430 Transportation by road confirmed. Shipment also contains UN1268 Petroleum distillates, n.o.s Class 3 Single Package or Inner Packaging (if any) Packaging Type: Bottle Material of Construcion:Metal Package Capacity: 473 g Amount in Package: 473 g Number in Shipment: 1 Number Failed: 1

item.title: Report E-2025030121
item.description:
Report E-2025030121

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-21
  • City: CASTLETON ON HUDSON
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While unloading freight from trailer forklift operator struck two pails with the forkblades from the forklift consequently puncturing them contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the 2 punctured pails.
